ingredients.title: Ingredients & Science
ingredients.subtitle: Every ingredient backed by science
ingredients.intro_title: The Golden Combination for Liver Protection
ingredients.intro_p1: Our formula is based on multiple international clinical studies, selecting natural active ingredients with liver-protective efficacy, scientifically proportioned to work synergistically, providing comprehensive nutritional support for the liver.
ingredients.intro_p2: Each ingredient has undergone rigorous safety and efficacy validation, ensuring both safety and effectiveness in daily use.
ingredients.ingredient_1_desc: Contains active ingredient silymarin, clinically proven to protect liver cell membranes, promote liver detoxification, and reduce free radical damage.
ingredients.ingredient_2_desc: Powerful antioxidant component that helps reduce liver inflammation and supports the liver's ability to metabolize fats.
ingredients.ingredient_3_desc: Promotes glutathione synthesis, enhances liver detoxification capacity, with good auxiliary effects on alcohol and drug metabolism.
ingredients.ingredient_4_desc: Participates in liver energy metabolism, supports liver cell repair and regeneration, maintains normal liver physiological functions.

testimonials.review_1_content: Often working late and overtime, always feeling tired. After taking it for two months, I noticeably feel more energetic, and my health check results have improved.
testimonials.review_2_content: My job requires frequent business entertaining and drinking, very worried about liver health. Now I take it daily, feel I recover faster the next day, and my body burden is much less.
testimonials.review_3_content: When stressed, I easily get liver heat and poor sleep quality. After taking it for a while, my overall condition has improved a lot, and my family says my complexion has gotten better.

about.title: About LivBoss
about.intro: LivBoss is a premium nutrition brand focused on liver health
about.p1: We understand the health challenges modern people face: fast-paced work, frequent socializing, irregular schedules - all invisibly putting tremendous pressure on the liver. As the body's most important metabolic organ, liver health directly affects our overall condition and quality of life.
about.p2: Based on this insight, we have partnered with international nutrition experts and medical research institutions, using scientific research as the foundation, selecting premium ingredients from around the world, to create a truly effective liver protection formula. We adhere to high standards of quality control, with every batch of products undergoing rigorous third-party testing and certification.
about.mission_desc: is to ensure that everyone working hard for life can have a healthy liver, thereby having a better state to face work and life challenges.

article1.title: Know your liver: the body's silent powerhouse
article1.excerpt: Your liver works quietly every day to process nutrients, handle toxins, and support digestion. In this article, we look at what the liver actually does and why daily care matters.
article1.imageAlt: Scientific illustration of liver anatomy and function

article2.title: How lack of sleep can affect your liver
article2.excerpt: Staying up late once in a while is common, but long-term sleep debt can put extra stress on your liver. Learn how disrupted sleep may influence liver function and what you can do about it.
article2.imageAlt: Person sleeping peacefully for liver recovery

article3.title: Broccoli sprouts: a small plant with big potential
article3.excerpt: Broccoli sprouts are rich in natural compounds that have been widely studied for their role in antioxidant and detox pathways. Here we explain what they are and why they have attracted so much attention.
article3.imageAlt: Fresh broccoli sprouts with sulforaphane compounds

article4.title: Broccoli Sprouts and Liver Daily Support: A Scientific Review
article4.excerpt: An in-depth look at the science behind broccoli sprouts, sulforaphane, and their relationship with liver health. Includes clinical trial data and safety considerations.
article4.imageAlt: Scientific research on broccoli sprouts and liver health

glossary.title: Ingredient glossary
glossary.subtitle: A quick reference to key ingredients and terms often mentioned in liver wellness and broccoli sprout formulas. For the exact composition of any product, always follow the information on the label.
glossary.metaTitle: Ingredient Glossary - Liver Health Terms | LivBoss
glossary.metaDescription: Learn about key ingredients such as broccoli sprout extract, sulforaphane, B-complex vitamins and antioxidants in liver wellness formulas.

broccoli.name: Broccoli sprout extract
broccoli.description: Concentrated extract made from young broccoli sprouts. These sprouts naturally contain compounds that have been widely studied for their role in antioxidant and detox pathways. In liver support formulas, broccoli sprout extract is often used to support the body's own defence systems.

sulforaphane.name: Sulforaphane (from broccoli sprouts)
sulforaphane.description: Sulforaphane is a well-known compound that can be formed from nutrients found in broccoli sprouts. Research has focused on its involvement in antioxidant and cellular defence pathways. Supplement products may use broccoli sprout ingredients that are standardised for sulforaphane-related activity.

bvitamins.name: B-complex vitamins
bvitamins.description: A group of water-soluble vitamins, including B1, B2, B3, B6, B12, folate and others. B vitamins are involved in energy metabolism and many enzyme reactions. In liver wellness formulas they are often included to support general metabolism and daily vitality.

antioxidants.name: Antioxidant nutrients
antioxidants.description: A broad term for nutrients such as vitamin C, vitamin E, certain plant polyphenols and other compounds that help protect cells from oxidative stress. Antioxidant support is a common theme in liver-related nutrition.

liversupport.name: Liver support botanical blend
liversupport.description: A descriptive term for combinations of plant extracts traditionally used to support liver health and digestion, such as artichoke, milk thistle or turmeric. Different products use different blends, and not every formula contains the same ingredients. Always check the actual label for the formula you are using.

bcomplex.name: B-Complex Vitamins
bcomplex.description: Essential for energy metabolism and liver function. B vitamins (B1, B2, B6, B12) help the liver process fats, proteins, and carbohydrates while supporting cellular energy production.

milkthistle.name: Milk Thistle Extract (Silymarin)
milkthistle.description: Contains silymarin, a flavonoid complex that protects liver cell membranes, promotes regeneration, and supports healthy bile flow. Used for centuries in traditional medicine.

turmeric.name: Turmeric Extract (Curcumin)
turmeric.description: Curcumin is a potent anti-inflammatory and antioxidant compound that supports liver health by reducing oxidative damage and promoting healthy inflammatory response.

nac.name: N-Acetyl Cysteine (NAC)
nac.description: A precursor to glutathione, the body's master antioxidant. NAC replenishes glutathione stores in the liver, essential for detoxification and cellular protection.

alphalipoic.name: Alpha-Lipoic Acid
alphalipoic.description: A universal antioxidant that works in both water and fat-soluble environments. Supports liver detoxification and helps regenerate other antioxidants like vitamins C and E.

selenium.name: Selenium
selenium.description: An essential trace mineral that supports glutathione peroxidase, a key enzyme in the liver's antioxidant defense system.

zinc.name: Zinc
zinc.description: Critical for liver enzyme function, immune support, and cellular repair. Zinc deficiency can impair liver function and regeneration capacity.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Answers to common questions about using LivBoss liver support in daily life. This information is general in nature and does not replace medical advice.
help.metaTitle: Help Center - FAQs About Liver Support | LivBoss
help.metaDescription: Find answers to common questions about LivBoss usage, dosage, safety, and liver health support

faq.q1: Who is LivBoss Broccoli Sprout Liver Support designed for?
faq.a1: LivBoss is designed for adults who want daily support for their liver, especially people who often stay up late, have social drinking occasions, or feel that their lifestyle puts extra stress on the liver. It is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. If you have a medical condition, please talk to your doctor before use.
faq.q2: How should I take it and for how long?
faq.a2: Please follow the directions on the product label. In general, a consistent daily routine over several weeks or months is more important than taking a large amount at once. Many people choose to use liver support supplements for 3 months or longer as part of a lifestyle routine, but you should adjust according to your own situation and your healthcare professional's advice.
faq.q3: Can I take LivBoss together with other medications or supplements?
faq.a3: Because everyone's health condition and medication use are different, we cannot give individual medical advice. If you are taking prescription drugs, have a diagnosed liver condition, or are using other supplements, please consult your doctor or pharmacist before adding LivBoss. Bring the full ingredient list with you so they can review it.
faq.q4: Can pregnant or breastfeeding women use this product?
faq.a4: Dietary supplements for pregnant or breastfeeding women should always be used with caution. We recommend that pregnant, planning pregnancy, or breastfeeding women consult their doctor or other qualified healthcare professional before using any supplement, including LivBoss. If you are unsure, do not use the product.
faq.q5: Are there any side effects or things I should pay attention to?
faq.a5: LivBoss is a dietary supplement, not a medicine, but it still may not be suitable for everyone. Do not use it if you are allergic to broccoli, cruciferous vegetables, or any listed ingredients. If you feel unwell or notice unusual symptoms after taking it, stop using the product and seek medical advice. Keep out of reach of children.
faq.q6: Where can I buy LivBoss and is it available in my region?
faq.a6: Availability may differ by country and region. You can check the "Where to buy" section on our website or contact us directly for purchase channels and local partners. Please follow the regulations and product labels of your local market.
faq.a7: LivBoss is available through select online marketplaces and local partners depending on your region. Visit our 'Where to Buy' section for current availability in Southeast Asia, Mainland China, Japan, and other markets.
faq.a8: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep the container tightly closed. Do not refrigerate unless specified on the label. Keep out of reach of children.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our website or purchasing our products
terms.metaDescription: LivBoss terms and conditions for website use and product purchases

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.body: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this website or purchase our products.

section2.title: 2. Use of Website
section2.body: This website is intended for informational and commercial purposes. You may not use this site for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not transmit any viruses or malicious code. We reserve the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, or cancel orders at our discretion.

section3.title: 3. Product Information
section3.body: We strive to provide accurate product descriptions and information. However, we do not warrant that product descriptions or other content on this site is accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. Product packaging may vary from images shown.

section4.title: 4. No Medical Advice
section4.body: The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only and is not intended as medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before starting any new supplement regimen, especially if you have pre-existing health conditions or take medications. The products have not been evaluated by regulatory authorities to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, LivBoss and its affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the website or products. We do not guarantee specific health outcomes.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.body: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of LivBoss or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without express written permission.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
section7.body: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of the website following any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes. Please review these terms periodically.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacy.metaDescription: LivBoss privacy policy - learn how we handle your personal data and protect your privacy

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.body: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact customer support. This may include your name, email address, shipping address, phone number, and payment information. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our website, including IP address, browser type, and pages visited.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.body: We use the information we collect to process orders, communicate with you about your purchases, provide customer support, send marketing communications (with your consent), improve our website and services, prevent fraud and enhance security, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.body: We may share your information with service providers who assist us with business operations (such as payment processing, shipping, and email delivery), when required by law or to protect our rights, and in connection with any merger, sale, or transfer of our business. All third-party service providers are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information.

section4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking
section4.body: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect website functionality. We may use analytics services like Google Analytics to understand how users interact with our site.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.body: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.body: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict the use of your personal information. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or contacting us directly. For privacy-related inquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact us at privacy@livboss.com.

section7.title: 7. International Transfers
section7.body: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.body: Our website and products are not intended for children under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
section9.body: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our website after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at: privacy@livboss.com

faq.title: Product FAQ
faq.q1: Can I take this with other supplements?
faq.a1: Yes, LivBoss can generally be taken alongside most other supplements. However, if you're taking prescription medications, please consult your healthcare provider first.
faq.q2: How long before I see results?
faq.a2: Many users report feeling more energetic within 2-4 weeks. For optimal liver support benefits, we recommend consistent use for at least 2-3 months.
faq.a3: Yes, LivBoss uses vegetarian-friendly capsules and all ingredients are plant-based or synthetically derived (not from animal sources).
faq.a4: LivBoss is generally well-tolerated. Some people may experience mild digestive changes when first starting. If you experience any adverse effects, discontinue use and consult a healthcare professional.
